content.prompt: Which of the following historical contexts best reflects the issues in the debate depicted in the excerpt?

choices.label: The economic shifts that occurred as a result of the decline of manufacturing
The continuation of interventionist foreign policies following the Cold War
The passage of free-trade agreements with diplomatic allies in North America
The demographic shifts that occurred as a result of changing immigration patterns

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
